summary: COMPANION MAKEOVER - gives the DarkElf Assassin JENASSA a look which both suits her character and fighting skills! (+Unique Warpaint)
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1839/42202195260_4bfb99f7fc_o.jpg[/img]
[img]https://c2.staticflickr.com/8/7177/27260290305_4e410803e0_o.jpg[/img]
[size=4]Compatibility[/size]
My Jenassa-Makeover should be compatible with nearly ALL other mods - even Follower overhauls like Better Followers, UFO,...!
All you have to do is [b]make sure to load my esp-file AFTER all other companion mods[/b]! Mine is merely a simple texture replacer for her face - so the possibilty of conflicts is practically zero![/center]

[b]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/b] is also compatible but you have to make sure to follow these steps:
1. Uninstall Jenassa in NMM
2. Install Ethereal Elven Overhaul
3. Install Jenassa again and let it overwrite the Ethereal Elven Overhaul when prompted

Loadorder:
Ethereal Elven Overhaul
(...other mods)
UFO
Jenassa


[b][size=3]Know Conflicts >>> Specialized Followers[/size][/b] seems to be incompatible (right now I have no solution for this, and no idea if it can be fixed...)

[img]https://c4.staticflickr.com/8/7526/27260290235_c6b927be5f_o.jpg[/img]
[size=4]Recommended/Used mods[/size]
(to get the exact look you see in my images)

[b]EYES[/b] (very important for her look!) >>> I use mrLenski's great eye-replacer-textures [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869]Covereyes[/url]!
If you prefer another HD-Eye-Texture-Replacer mod you may get a very different result! To avoid this you could download the file manually and just replace the needed eye-texture for Jenassa ("eyeorcblind.dds" - and put it into your folder: Skyrim/Data/Textures/actors/character/eyes) - I hope this works!

[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3201]Armored Fur Hood[/url][/b] >>> after her unique Warpaint and eyecolor this HOOD is the most important part of Jenassas looks!
You can dress her any way you want - but please give her one of these, or a similar hood! They make her look complete and really complement all her facial features! Give it a try and you will love it (maybe this recommendation will change your mind if you initially didn't like the new hairstyle I gave her - because now you can understand that "my" Jenassa was never intended to go anywhere without her hood!) ;)

[b]Skintone[/b] used mod - face >>> [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url] (look 3 or the old look 1)
(You can use any Skintone for her - but you may get slightly different looks!
I can only recommend that you use a "natural" skintone - for all your females!) ;)

used mod - body >>> [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=18]No Dirty Bodies[/url] (best match for Coverwomen)
(just a recommendation - you can use any skintone and bodymod you want!)


[b]WARPAINT[/b] >>> her unique warpaint is a mixture of three vanilla-warpaint patterns.
(If you are using warpaint-replacers I can't predict how this will affect her look!)
[img]https://c5.staticflickr.com/8/7427/26984794860_4926b20408_o.jpg[/img]
Like the default Jenassa you can find her improved version in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun. For a modest fee she will join you on your adventures and help you against your enemies with her great Assassin/Ranger Skills (she favours Bows and dual Weapons)!
Beside improving her looks I have also made her essential - for everything else (Skills, Armor, Weapons, Marriage) I left the default values.

To improve Jenassa's behaviour (and all other followers) I can highly recommend the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url] mod!
(make sure to load her esp-file AFTER any follower-tweak/improvement-mods)


You can get Jenassa's favourit weapons and apparel here (A big THANK YOU to all the mod-authors for their amazing creations!):
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6684]Mercenary Armor, Gauntlets and Boots[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3201]Armored Fur Hood (with Scarf)[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11130]HN66s Earrings[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7109]Scout Bow + Arrows[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1002]Albenswords + Dragonsting Dagger[/url]
[img]https://c2.staticflickr.com/8/7422/27260290345_293f15610a_o.jpg[/img]
[size=4]INSTALLATION[/size] >>> Download manually or with the NMM.
Manual Installation: Unrar, place the data folder in your main Skyrim directory.
(I have included her facegen-files in the folder to avoid possible head/skin problems)



[center][size=3][color=lightgreen]Thanks for downloading! Please leave a comment!
I really appreciate your feedback and support! :)[/color][/size][/center]

[center]
If you enjoy Jenassa's new looks ingame and you take screenshots of her, please share them here in the image section!
I love to see which adventures she experiences with your dragonborn!
[img]https://c7.staticflickr.com/8/7355/27225550966_5cfcb8dd2e_o.jpg[/img]
